title: pretty sure ocean week is cancer, since only one team can win---
body:
---and you have to get the points before the tier is reached **even though ocean week lasts another 5 days**

Why? Just why? Why limit it to those who get 3 BEFORE the tier is reached only, when it lasts 5 more days. Good for those people who have 20+ points, you are credit to team, but it just makes it harder for those who don't play as often and/or don't main ocean week champions to even get to 3 before the key tiers are reached. Why the HELL did you do it like that riot.

the friends I got my first 2 points with aren't on, and at this rate the final tier will be reached before they are on again. Can't win solo because for some reason I'm getting the most unbelievably retarded teams that I'm not good enough to carry on the ocean week champions, none of whom I main.

pretty close to just saying fuck this bullshit and going back to play FF5.

**edit: Hey look guys, this is right off their fucking ocean week reveal:**

**The sun is shining and the waves are up, which means the Australia Day and Waitangi Day long weekends are not far off! To celebrate we’re issuing a challenge of aquatic proportions. If you can rally together and contribute enough points during Ocean Week it will unlock rewards for everyone that participates.**

**so much for rallying together when you can only get points if you win. "during ocean week" oops too bad we actually meant 1/6 of the way through ocean week when all the tiers are filled out, after that too bad if you actually have a life outside of playing league all day. "unlock rewards for everyone that participates" oops we forgot, even though we said just participating is enough, you actually have to win the games not just participate.**

replies.body:
First of all, this event lasts for a week, while soloQ can be participated at any time, especially since it's the start of the season. Doesn't take a genius to decide which one is more worthwhile to participate in.

Second of all, you do NOT have to main the ocean week champs. This isn't bloody soloQ, people aren't going to be mad at you for playing first time lee sin or gragas support. Just try something new instead of nonstop playing kat or fizz in every mode possible.

Third of all, I can tell you are obviously a soloQ player that is stuck in "elo hell" due to the thing you have said, and as far as I am concerned, getting 3 wins isn't that hard even if you don't play a lot every day. No need to insult the people that do.

Finally, you have no right to be using uncivil language for no reason and being mad at people that are simply trying to be friendly and help. Riot is trying its hardest to improve the game and help the community, they are a very active company, and if you pull in the tribunal argument again, if people were less like you, and be more broad-minded and be nicer in general, OCE will never even need a tribunal in the first place.

"wah, I'm %%%%. And people that aren't part of an event aren't being rewarded for not being part of it,  it's cancer"
jesus christ

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VBEapU2M,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-25T05:48:38.957+0000)
>
> "wah, I'm %%%%. And people that aren't part of an event aren't being rewarded for not being part of it,  it's cancer"
> jesus christ

I am part of the event. It's not my fault I don't main any of the ocean week champions. Consequently, I can't actually carry these teams of seemingly 5 IQ. They pick champions they don't know how to play, which is fine because they're also trying for points, but then they don't even look up a guide first, won't listen to advice, make a ton of mistakes which don't even have to do specifically with their champion but just general gameplay, and  then proceed to feed, and feed, and feed, and feed. And then because I'm not playing a champion I'm particularly good at, I can't pull us out of the feeding.

Ocean week is supposed to be in good spirits. It cannot be in good spirits when ONLY ONE TEAM CAN WIN, AND YOU HAVE TO WIN TO GET OCEAN WEEK POINTS.

> [{quoted}](name=Dota2forthewin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VBEapU2M,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-25T05:49:10.305+0000)
>
> You want your name on that statue so bad. lel

Not even, or I'd be playing right now despite the cancer teams. It's the principle of the thing. If you get unlucky with matchmaking, don't main any of the ocean week champs, and don't have the time to play league all %%%%ing day like an inbred nolifer, how exactly are you supposed to get the points.

Oh wait, you can't.

you don't have to main an ocean week champ, just play a norm as a premade 5 and have someone pick an ocean week champ, and then win. not that hard to get points.

why should they reward losers? that doesn't make sense.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VBEapU2M,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-01-25T05:57:37.969+0000)

> 
> why should they reward losers? that doesn't make sense.

Yes, you do, if you want to carry solo. People are going full %%%%%% when they try these ocean week champions throwing all their normal game decision making out the %%%%ing window even without taking into account their nonexistent skills with the champion itself.

and it's supposed to be about OCE spirit and rallying together not about half the population rekting the other half?

It's entirely possible to get unlucky and be unable to win 3 times in the short period it will/has take/n to get to the final tier. With the amount of people trying to use the ocean week champions vs those who main ocean week champions, matchmakingis WAYYYY outof whack. And if you actually have a life outside of league and can't play all day every day; and if your premade isn't available oops too bad for you. Oh and even if they are available you still have to, actually win. So much for "unlock rewards for everyone that participates"

Like my teacher said:

"European aren't grateful for what they have". *Applies to certain ofc*

Asians thank people just for the tiniest things.

And there's you raging your head off.
I'm sure if you ask for help someone might be able to queue with you.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VBEapU2M,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-25T05:40:08.041+0000)
>
> I'm sure if you ask for help someone might be able to queue with you.

I probably will, but it's not even the main point.

OCEAN WEEK LASTS FOR 5 MORE DAYS. WHY IS IT RESTRICTED TO ONLY THE PEOPLE WHO GET 3 POINTS BEFORE THE FINAL TIER IF IT LASTS 5 MORE DAYS.

There are already people with 20+ points, they are credit to team sure, but it just makes it even harder for those having trouble getting points, to get them before the tier is reached. That's not their fault though, it's Riot's fault for setting it up the way they did.
Yeh. I'll admit 275,000 is a bit of an underestimation by Riot. I think they just didn't expect points to be gained so fast, this being OCE.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VBEapU2M,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-25T05:44:23.791+0000)
>
> Yeh. I'll admit 275,000 is a bit of an underestimation by Riot. I think they just didn't expect points to be gained so fast, this being OCE.

it shouldn't have been restricted by tier at all though, regardless of their underestimation. Everything should be given out to anyone who got the points by the end of ocean week.

3 points in 7 days seemed easy, so we waited until we had a premade on to make it not crap.

then we stopped after 2 games because we don't have that much time for loling, and then I looked closer today and realised I don't even get the IP boost, and may now not get the final tier either. It sucks, and should change.

At least my sister who also plays lol was lucky enough to get a point in solo queue I guess, so she has 3 at least.

I'm willing to agree that the IP boost shouldn't have been restricted but I think Riot made the right choice by restriction the 'summoner name on artificial reef statue' reward. You have to remember that there is a significant amount of people on the OCE server, despite it being small compared to other servers, and a significant number of those accounts are inactive. Having it not be restricted to those who played during the event would essentially clutter the statue and waste Riots time and money. They could have made it so you could get it by playing an ocean week champ rather than needing to win 3 games with one though, so they didn't do too well with the decision making in my opinion.

Oh and guess what the ocean week reveal said

The sun is shining and the waves are up, which means the Australia Day and Waitangi Day long weekends are not far off! To celebrate we’re issuing a challenge of aquatic proportions. If you can rally together and contribute enough points during Ocean Week it will unlock rewards for everyone that participates.


It's supposed to be OCE coming together, and specifically says "during ocean week" which still has 5 days to go.

Scroll down and suddenly, so much for OCE coming together. You can only get points if you win regardless of playing ocean week champions.

And too bad for "during ocean week" when it has to be done before the tier is achieved.
You want your name on that statue so bad. lel
